name: Mallory JONES, et al., Petitioners, v. Ramone LAMKIN, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Marshal of the Civil and Magistrate Court of Richmond County, Georgia, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Mallory JONES, et al., Petitioners,
v.
Ramone LAMKIN, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Marshal of the Civil and Magistrate Court of Richmond County, Georgia, et al.
attorneys: Motion of National Fraternal Order of Police for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Mallory JONES, et al., Petitioners,
v.
Ramone LAMKIN, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Marshal of the Civil and Magistrate Court of Richmond County, Georgia, et al.
No. 19-726.
Supreme Court of the United States.
April 6, 2020
Motion of National Fraternal Order of Police for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
